hero.title: Take Charge of Your Weight Control Journey
hero.description: Our platform helps you track your meals, monitor your progress, and achieve your weight control goals efficiently.

features.toolsDescription: Our platform is designed to empower your weight control journey with simple yet effective tools.

list.name: Track Your Meals
list.description: Easily log meals and keep track of your calorie intake to stay on top of your weight control goals.

list.name: Monitor Progress
list.description: Visualize your weight journey with detailed charts, so you can measure progress effectively.

list.name: Set Goals
list.description: Define personalized weight targets and let us help you stay on track.

list.name: Secure & Private
list.description: We ensure your data is encrypted and accessible only to you for complete privacy.
